description: A floating restaurant ship in the East Blue, known for its excellent food and strict policy of feeding anyone who is hungry. Owned and operated by former pirate Red-Leg Zeff and his staff of fighting cooks.

keyEvents.title: Gin vs Sanji Battle at Baratie
keyEvents.description: Gin and Sanji engage in combat on the deck of the Baratie restaurant ship.
keyEvents.significance: The location where one of the most emotionally complex fights in the East Blue Saga takes place.

keyEvents.title: MH5 Poison Gas Deployed at Baratie
keyEvents.description: Don Krieg unleashes the MH5 poison gas bomb at the Baratie, threatening to kill everyone on board.
keyEvents.significance: The Baratie faces its greatest threat as Krieg is willing to destroy it completely.

keyEvents.title: Baratie Engulfed in Poison Cloud
keyEvents.description: The entire Baratie restaurant ship is covered in the deadly MH5 poison gas cloud.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a desperate situation where the Baratie staff must dive into the water to survive.

statusHistory.reason: Under attack by Don Krieg and exposed to MH5 poison gas
